Name: Sharecare YOU
About the game: The winner of the 2019 Appy Best VR App is now available on Mac and PC, with more content, bolder graphics, and enhanced features! Sharecare YOU is a fully immersive, photorealistic simulation of the human body, enabling viewers to explore its astonishing details in full 360° . Interested in learning about a specific organ? With the click of a button, travel inside, see it in action - watch how it functions healthily and even simulate disease progression. Want to learn more? Apply our tags and labels along the way to get deeper information, medically accurate terminology and test your knowledge with our interactive quizzes. Sharecare YOU includes: An ever-expanding library of more than 40 different modules to explore, including anatomy, physiology, conditions, and treatments Informative labels and contextual information Completely updated user interface with unique interactive controls Growing library of exclusive video content Voice-over descriptions and pronunciation of labels We’re not stopping here! We’re hard at work adding to YOU’s vast library of organs, systems, scenes, and abilities, with more to come in 2022. Interested in Sharecare YOU for VR ? Find it here!
